page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE - G.PAILOR
page.content: My name is Greame Pailor and I am 11 years and 8 months old. I live in Low Fell, Gateshead. My usual day goes like this: My father wakes me at 8 o'clock. After washing and dressing I go downstairs for breakfast-usually 2 pieces of lightly done toast. Then I walk briskly to school and enjoy a game of football. When the whistle is blown at 8.55 I take up position on the stairs. I am a monitor. During the morning we have assembly, maths and subjects like dancing or music. After dinner, which I have at home, we might have lessons like Environmental Studies, Art, Reading or P.E. During the evening I like to watch TV, play outside or read. At 9 o'clock I have my supper, bedtime being 9.30.
